Description: Grey gneiss bowl with a flat base and a shoulder round which runs a band of incised white Hieroglyphic text including the cartouche of Amenirdis.
Curator's comments: PM I Part 2: p.840 P. Meyrat, "De l'origine du bol en gneiss d'Amenirdis (British Museum EA 4701)", ENIM 6, 2013, p. 233-242
Exhibition history: 2018-2019 27 Oct -27 Jan, France, Musee de Grenoble, Amon to Thebes
